title: 81/642/EEC: Commission Decision of 28 July 1981 on the implementation of the reform of agricultural structures in Italy pursuant to Council Directive 72/159/EEC (Only the Italian text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 28 July 1981 on the implementation of the reform of agricultural structures in Italy pursuant to Council Directive 72/159/EEC (Only the Italian text is authentic) (81/642/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The provisions existing in Italy for the implementation of Directive 72/159/EEC, having regard to the provisions forwarded on 5 June 1981 and determining the comparable income for 1981 and indicating its rate of growth, continue to satisfy the conditions for financial contribution by the Community to common measures within the meaning of Article 15 of Directive 72/159/EEC.
This Decision is addressed to the Italian Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 28 July 1981.
For the Commission
The President
Gaston THORN
(1) OJ No L 96, 23.4.1972, p. 1.  (2) OJ No L 90, 3.4.1980, p. 43.
